statements: SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE product_id = 123;
SELECT review_id, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_id = 789;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id IN (789, 456);
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY review_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT review_id, product_id, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY customer_id, product_id HAVING avg_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%great%' AND customer_id IN (456, 789) ORDER BY review_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(review_id) AS review_count FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY review_count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT customer_name, rating, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT product_id, customer_name, rating FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, review_id, sentiment_score, analysis_result FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5;
SELECT review_id, product_id, customer_name, rating, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE product_id = 1234 AND rating >= 3 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT review_id, product_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY review_id, product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY review_id;
SELECT r.customer_name, s.analysis_result FROM customer_reviews AS r INNER JOIN sentiment_analysis AS s ON r.review_id = s.review_id WHERE s.sentiment_score > 0.7 ORDER BY s.analysis_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(review_id) > 2 ORDER BY total_reviews DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4
SELECT customer_id, product_id, rating FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY product_id
SELECT MAX(rating) AS max_rating FROM customer_reviews
SELECT review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(review_text) > 100 ORDER BY review_id ASC
SELECT * FROM product_feedback WHERE rating_avg > 4.5 ORDER BY rating_avg DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 123 AND rating > 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(review_id) AS num_reviews FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY product_id HAVING num_reviews > 10 ORDER BY product_id ASC;

SELECT p.product_id, p.rating_avg, COUNT(r.review_id) AS num_reviews FROM product_feedback p JOIN customer_reviews r ON p.product_id = r.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id ORDER BY num_reviews DESC, p.rating_avg DESC;

SELECT r.review_text, s.sentiment_score, s.sentiment_category FROM customer_reviews r JOIN sentiment_analysis s ON r.review_id = s.review_id WHERE r.rating > 3 AND s.sentiment_score > 0.8 ORDER BY s.sentiment_score DESC, r.review_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, average_rating FROM product_ratings ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM product_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, average_rating, total_ratings FROM product_ratings WHERE total_ratings < 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5);
SELECT * FROM customers_reviews WHERE rating > 4.0;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, sentiment_score FROM sentiments WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5;
SELECT product_id, feedback_summary FROM feedback_analysis WHERE sentiment_label = 'Positive';
SELECT customer_id, product_id, rating FROM customers_reviews WHERE rating > 4
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY category ASC
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT product_id, feedback_summary, sentiment_label FROM feedback_analysis WHERE sentiment_label = 'Positive'
SELECT review_text FROM customers_reviews WHERE id = 10
